    • Method Detail

      • isCommand

        public boolean isCommand​(String... x)
        Checks that one of the commands applies. This allows for things like short and long form commands to be checked with as single call, e.g. 
             isCommand("r","read");
        It also handles missing commands.
        Parameters:
        x -
        Returns:
